1.title: Music & Sounds

episode of.title: Music and Sounds with Bonnie Bear (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Bonnie listens to sounds coming from all different places - you'll hear music from a parade, raindrops on a rainy day, street noises and so much more.

2.title: A Trip Around Town

episode of.title: Music and Sounds with Bonnie Bear (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Join Bonnie on a musical journey as she hears sounds from a concert hall and a music class. The fun continues with a trip to the garden, kitchen and more.

imdb.plot outline: Together with her best friend, Mr. Gramophone, Bonnie Bear creates colorful paintings from sounds that she hears. "Bonnie Bear" demonstrates how working with both your ears and hands can bring together sounds and colors to create a beautiful, whole picture.
imdb.title: Music and Sounds with Bonnie Bear
akas: Music and Sounds with Bonnie Bear (United States)
plot: Together with her best friend, Mr. Gramophone, Bonnie Bear creates colorful paintings from sounds that she hears. "Bonnie Bear" demonstrates how working with both your ears and hands can bring together sounds and colors to create a beautiful, whole picture.
